overview:
Sean is the Investment Analyst and New Investment Manager at Invested Development. He manages Invested Developmentâ€™s African office in Nairobi, Kenya. Sean works to source the pipeline and analyzes investment opportunities and seeks to partner with like-minded organizations to increase deal flow.

Prior to joining Invested Development, Sean co-oped with Bain & Company and the Boston Consulting Group and studied African Development at the University of Ghana. He holds a BS in Business Administration with a concentration on Entrepreneurship and New Venture Management from Northeastern University.
